creator: magicp.jp@gmail.com
summary: Inspector does not change to vertical mode quickly when selecting "Dock to right"

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

comments.text:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Start Nightly
2. Go to about:home (Style editor shows 2 panes by this step)
3. Open Inspector (2 panes) with the horizontal mode
4. Switch Style editor and go back Inspector
5. Select "Dock to right"(or left)

Actual results:
Inspector does not change to vertical mode when selecting "Dock to right"(or left) after switching Style editor.

However, it will be changed to vertical mode after about 30 seconds. After that, when selecting "Dock to bottom", it does not change to the horizontal mode.


Expected results:
Change to the vertical mode quickly when selecting "Dock to right"(or left) .


Regression range:
https://hg.mozilla.org/integration/mozilla-inbound/pushloghtml?fromchange=7d3ae4f78bd11c724c187c39dc6e0fcab2fcc3bb&tochange=b0682001d1f7d5b335ec4cc8ca234401f67d8640
comments.author: magicp.jp@gmail.com
